title: Substance Abuse: Assessment and Treatment
description: Etiological, assessment, diagnostic, and treatment models of chemical depend-ency. Comparison of disease/medical, psychodynamic, cognitive/ behavioral, humanistic, existential, and sociocultural approaches. Differential diagnosis, co-morbidity with other conditions, and associated factors. 4 seminars.
prerequisites: Graduate standing and PSY 560, PSY 565, PSY 574, or consent of instructor
